instruction: We have received your request to activate your account. You can use the verification code below to activate your account :
code_expiration: This code is valid for the next 60 minutes. After this time, it will expire and you will need to request a new code if you have not activated your account.
alternative_text: You can also use the verification link below :
support_message_part1: We look forward to seeing you get the most out of Focus. If you have any questions, do not hesitate to contact our customer support at
footer_warning: If you did not request this account creation, you may ignore this email or contact us for more information.
